here are the codes"Hydras gave him the codes to free Destructor"and 
tell me when he's in conditions to work, 'cause I imagine he would 
need a quik check... and Startsorm" said to a femme Whose moved 
toward them"Follow me, Perceptor"said to the male whose was 
taround "Check that all those usless are working while I retunr"


Hydras and Startorm followed Proto.

his hands. When Megatron got flund towards him he blasted at

of control megatron cut Destructor in half durring his fall. The 
images stopped and Proto came back to his silver robot form. "You 
see Galvatron storred him in the ice chamber to kepp him alive, you 
prolly dont remember because Galvatron's memories are repressed

> > > > > > > > > > > > >    Underneath the earth's crust a beign

> > > > > > > > > > > > to the walls of earth slowly the silver ooze

> > > > and 
> > > > > > > > climbed 
> > > > > > > > > > > > ever so slightly. Over the course of years

> > clung 
> > > > and 
> > > > > > > > > > scratched

> > > > eruption

> > > > > > > > > > > > shiny line of silver shot into the air. 
Hovering 
> > in 
> > > > the 
> > > > > > air 
> > > > > > > > it 
> > > > > > > > > > > > molded into a metallic ball. The sun gleamed 
> > against 
> > > > it 
> > > > > > > > showing 
> > > > > > > > > > the 
> > > > > > > > > > > > spark in its center. Its conciousness 
searched 
> > and 
> > > > > > searched 
> > > > > > > > for 
> > > > > > > > > > a 
> > > > > > > > > > > > memory a form it could manifest into. 
Suddenly 
> > it 
> > > > sprang 
> > > > > > > > forth

> > > > > > > > > > > > and legs. It had transformed into Rodimus 
Prime.

> > > > > > at

> > > > > > with 
> > > > > > > > his

> > > > spark 
> > > > > > in a 
> > > > > > > > > > > > projected form and not of Rodimus 
> > > > > > > > > > > > Prime.."P..rrrrr....o...t...o..lives!"
